sentence.Network_en: The skin will cicatrize and it will heal soon.
sentence.Network_cn: 表皮很快就会结疤,伤口很快就会康复.

PerfectNetExp.abs: (=cicatricosus)具痂的, 花痕状的的英文翻译 ... cicatrization 瘢痕生成, 愈合 cicatrize 生成瘢痕, 愈合 cicely 没药科植物.
(=cicatricosus)具痂的, 花痕状的的英文翻译 ... cicatrization 瘢痕生成, 愈合 cicatrize 生成瘢痕, 愈合 cicely 没药科植物.
兽医学英语... ... 瘢痕形成，结瘢 cicatrization 收瘢，生瘢 cicatrize 收瘢小肠结肠炎，成瘢小肠结肠炎 cicatrizing enterocolitis.

list.abs: chrysiasis 金质沉着症cicatrical fibromatosis 瘢痕性纤维瘤病cicatrisation 瘢痕挛缩
兽医学英语... ... 收瘢，生瘢 cicatrize 收瘢小肠结肠炎，成瘢小肠结肠炎 cicatrizing enterocolitis 西塞紫云英 Cicer milkvetch.
repair of axillary cicatrical contracture with island skin flaps of scapular region ., 肩胛区岛状皮瓣修复腋窝瘢痕挛缩.
chymotrypsin 胰凝乳朊酶cicatrical tissue 瘢痕组织cicatrix 瘢痕

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French cicatriser, from cicatrice 'scar' (see cicatrix)

means.word_mean: 1. form a scar, after an injury;

sentences.sentence: "the skin will cicatrize and it will heal soon"
